description: React component 'NoteEditor' for creating and editing notes with rich text controls, including title, content editing, and formatting options.

methods.name: NoteEditor({ note, onChange, onSave, editing, setEditing })
methods.description: React functional component for note editing/viewing with formatting controls.

methods.name: format
methods.description: Applies formatting commands (bold, italic, underline) to the editable note content.

ctags.name: NoteEditor
ctags.pattern: /^function NoteEditor({ note, onChange, onSave, editing, setEditing }) {$/
